thread.title: What would happen to the Earth if the moon exploded - Business Insider
thread.title_full: What would happen to the Earth if the moon exploded - Business Insider

author: Kevin Reilly
title: What would happen to the Earth if the moon exploded - Business Insider
text:
embed 
Neal Stephenson’s 2015 sci-fi novel “ Seveneves ” begins with, “The moon blew up with no warning and no apparent reason.” It turns out that scientists think his ideas of what might happen next are plausible — and those results don’t look good for anyone living on Earth. 
Additional animation by Rob Ludacer. Additional video courtesy of NASA.
